title: Star Wars: Darth Vader and the Ghost Prison
description: A traitorous uprising against the fledgling Galactic Empire leaves Emperor Palpatine close to death. Saving the Emperor—and the Empire—appears to be a lost cause . . . unless Vader can uncover the secrets of the Jedi Council and locate the mysterious “Ghost Prison.” Collects the five-issue miniseries. * Written by The Force Unleashed’s Haden Blackman! * A beautiful, fully painted graphic novel in hardcover with dust jacket!
author: W. Haden Blackman
